import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import swal from 'sweetalert2'; const EditWatch = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [watchData, setWatchData] = useState({ watch_name: '', watch_thumbnail: '', brands: '', price: '', discount: '', watch_details: '', gender: '', dial_type: '', dial_colour: '', dial_shape: '', style: '', strap_material: '' }); useEffect(() => { const fetchWatchData = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get(`http://127.0.0.1:8000/dashboard/watches/${id}/`); setWatchData(response.data); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching watch:', error); } }; fetchWatchData(); }, [id]); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; if (name === 'watch_thumbnail') { // Handle file selection separately handleFileChange(e); return; // Prevent default handling for this field } setWatchData({ ...watchData, [name]: value }); console.log(watchData) }; const handleFileChange = (e) => { const file = e.target.files[0]; if (file) { // Update state with actual file object setWatchData({ ...watchData, watch_thumbnail: file }); } else { // Preserve the current image URL if no file selected setWatchData({ ...watchData, watch_thumbnail: watchData.original_watch_thumbnail }); // Assuming you have this somewhere } }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const formData = new FormData(); for (let key in watchData) { formData.append(key, watchData[key]); console.log(watchData[key]); } console.log(formData); try { const response = await axios.put(`http://127.0.0.1:8000/dashboard/watches/${id}/edit/`, formData, { headers: { 'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data' } }); console.log('Watch updated successfully:', response.data); navigate('/watch'); swal.fire({ title: "Watch Updated", icon: "success", toast: true, timer: 6000, position: 'top-right', timerProgressBar: true, showConfirmButton: false }) } catch (error) { console.error('Error updating watch:', error); } }; return (

); }; export default EditWatch;
